document_data.name: Lysson
document_data.mainbody:
'''Private Lysson''' was a soldier who served in the [[Neverwinter Guard]] during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Template:Cite game/Neverwinter}}
{{Quote|The orcs of the [[Many-Arrows|Many-Arrows Tribe]] are threatening to overwhelm this area of the city. The Neverwinter Guard could use your help in driving them back!|Lysson}}
document_data.Possessions: He wore a full suit of [[plate mail]] armor and helm that largely obscured his face.
document_data.History: After the [[siege of Neverwinter]] in the {{YearlinkName|1479}}, Lysson was stationed in the city's [[Neverwinter/River District|Tower District]]. He acted as a liaison for [[Creed (human)|Sergeant Creed]], guiding adventurers to aid in the sergeant's efforts to take back the area from the occupying force of the [[Many-Arrows]] [[orc]]s.
